replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
回复 s0909093333 的帖子

那不是BUG... 是1.6版新加进去的功能... 

The client will ask minecraft.net if the current login is valid. If the server says “no”, a warning message appears in the client. You can still play the game even if this happens. 

用意是提醒盗版玩家... 要是嫌讯息太烦人, 请购买正版游戏...

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
回复 kidvsgin 的帖子

WIKI 的更新列表:

1.6.6

    Bonemeal can grow tall grass and flowers on grass blocks.
    Added Performance in Video Settings, Options Menu. Can be set to Max FPS, Balanced or Power saver.
    Changed the material of glowstone from “glass” to “stone”. This means you need a pickaxe to get resources from it. This also means you can now place redstone, torches, levers,etc. on them.
    Made Glowstone drop more loot (Up to 4 Glowstone Dust).
    Made the recipe sizes for creating cloth blocks and glowstone blocks smaller (2x2 instead of 3x3). 

Bug Fixes:

    Fixed Beds not working very well at all in SMP.
    Fixed destroying a Boat spawning the player too low, causing them to sometimes fall through the ground.
    Boats float up to the surface quicker.
    Boats falling down into water lose their vertical momentum very fast.
    Shift clicking a tool into a chest no longer restores it to new. 

New Bugs:

    When putting torches all around a bed in SSP, you will not sleep until daytime.
    When moving items in inventory screens, items, eg. sticks, will go under blocks, like dirt.
    When pillaring, it is possible to get stuck and repeatedly go into the block below you. If you disconnect and come back, you will be on the block above your head. If you are in the nether and way up near the top, you will skip to on top of bedrock.
    When you disconnect (SMP) at the bottom of a very high wall and reconnect to the server, sometimes your y position have been increased : so you are in the air beside the wall, but you don't fall.

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
大概是各人的電腦環境不同, 所造成的差異吧... 

你看當初蘿卜大發的1.5_01綠色版的帖子, 
也只有我反應有這樣的問題, 其他人用了都沒事...

而且我是點擊 minecraft.exe 後沒有任何作用, 
也不像樓上反應的那樣, 還有選擇畫面出現, 然後才黑屏...

所以改用 1.4 的 minecraft.exe 能不能解決所謂的黑屏問題, 
或許要請樓上那二位先試用過, 再回覆一下試用結果...

如果你認為是訊息破解補丁出的問題, 可以另行下載蘿卜大的Minecraft Beta v1.6.6 更新文件

replies.author: xiaohwu
replies.txt_content:
well 发表于 2011-6-4 18:00 
... 照樓上朋友的說法, 綠色版還是可以用... 真是怪了...
難道真是因人而異, 跟各人電腦環境水土不服??
本人提供一個方法吧!

PS:以上方法只限windows XP繁中用戶適用!

第一步:把你剛下來的東西解壓後把我的世界v.1.xxx改為minecraft
第二步:再把你文件的根目錄"Minecraft扂腔岍賜"改為minecraft
第三步:點擊文件夾內的".minecraft",再打開bin...
第四步:用壓縮檔方式開啟minecraft.jar,并找到META-INF,把它刪除
第五步:開始你的minecraft旅程

replies.txt_content:

bbsun 发表于 2011-6-5 08:15 
49楼高人正解，删除META-INF就正常了
“第四步:用壓縮檔方式開啟minecraft.jar,并找到META-INF,把它刪除” ...
其實板本是1.6.6,

但遊戲上顯示1.6.4,但你會發現這很明顯是惡搞"Minecraft Beta 1.6.4 :)"

亮點是後面的" :) "很明顯是惡搞了

replies.author: xiaohwu
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 xiaohwu 于 2011-6-5 11:19 编辑 
well 发表于 2011-6-5 02:46 
回复 xiaohwu 的帖子

呃... 難道又是這個萬惡的 META-INF 在作怪??
我先來說明一下吧

這句話又是一個亮點
"PS：  = =！ 加了 盜版訊息的破解補丁 感谢well童鞋 提供~  "

所謂的盜版訊息的破解補丁就是把遊戲顯示的"unlisence xxxxx"移除變回"minecraft 1.6.x"

但是使用該補丁要把meta-inf檔砍掉,否則無法正常進行遊戲
詳情請看"http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-5334-1-1.html"

樓主不厚道,不提醒哥們要砍掉meta-inf檔
